availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
State of Pennsylvania
City of Philadelphia } SS

I, Morris S Wickersham of the City of Philadelphia do hereby declare & affirm that I will well & truly execute & perform all the duties of Commissioner of Deeds &c of the state of Kentucky according to the laws of the state.
In witness whereof I have hereunto set my hand & seal this Twenty Second day of December 1862.

figure.ab:
MORRIS S. WICKERSHAM
COMMISSIONER OF
PHILADELPHIA, PENN.

body.p:
State of Pennsylvania
City of Philadelphia } SS

I, William V Archer, Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky duly appointed & commissioned by the Governor thereof for the state of Pennsylvania authorized to take & certify depositions do hirby certify that the foregoing affidavit of Morris S Wickersham was taken before me this Twenty Second day of December 1862 in the said city of Philadelphia.

Wm V Archer
Commissioner of Kentucky
Philadelphia Pennsylvania
